meanings.definition: Having adhesive already applied to the back for easy installation.
meanings.sent1: The prepasted wallpaper was simple to hang.
meanings.sent2: I bought prepasted envelopes for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The prepasted labels made the task a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her prepasted project was a sticky situation.
meanings.sent5: The prepasted surface stuck firmly in place.

meanings.definition: To apply adhesive to the back before use.
meanings.sent1: She prepasted the poster before sticking it up.
meanings.sent2: Remember to prepaste the stamps before mailing.
meanings.sent3: He prepasted the notes, making them ready for use.
meanings.sent4: The chef prepasted the labels on the jars of spices.
meanings.sent5: They prepasted the labels on the boxes for organization.
